mapper.select: SELECT R.REPLY_ID , R.QNA_ID , R.CONTENT , R.CRT_DATE , R.EMAIL , Q.ID , Q.SUBJECT , Q.CONTENT , Q.CRT_DATE , Q.MDF_DATE , Q.FILE_NAME , Q.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , Q.EMAIL Q_EMAIL , R_M.EMAIL M_EMAIL , R_M.NAME , R_M.LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT , R_M.LATEST_LOGIN , R_M.AUTHORITY FROM REPLY R , QNA Q , MEMBERS R_M , MEMBERS Q_M WHERE Q.EMAIL = Q_M.EMAIL AND R.EMAIL = R_M.EMAIL AND R.QNA_ID = Q.ID AND Q.ID = #{id}
SELECT REPLY_ID replyId , QNA_ID qnaId , CONTENT , CRT_DATE crtDate , EMAIL FROM REPLY WHERE REPLY_ID = #{replyId}
